description.value:
You are among the most common of changelings-those born to green hags-and a vibrant green eye signifies that parentage. Your mother's manipulative nature and versatile voice gives you an edge when deceiving others.

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Charming Liar]{Charming Liar} skill feat. If you roll Deception for initiative, foes in that combat encounter that haven't acted yet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} against you.
